title: A Quick Look at your fonts
content: Leopard has a new way of previewing fonts. Not the total solution but very fast and fun way of briefly looking at the basic design in a font. I just decided to translate one of my little articles to English [http://font.is/?p=290](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020054645/http:/font.is/?p=290 "http://font.is/?p=290") because I thought maybe some might find this useful. For many this is just obvious stuff but I am pretty sure that for some it will be a discovery.
author: sigurarm
